name: dspy-skills
description: Collection of 14 skills for DSPy framework - program language models, optimize prompts, and build RAG pipelines systematically

plugins.name: dspy-skills
plugins.description: Collection of 14 skills for DSPy framework - program language models, optimize prompts, and build RAG pipelines systematically. Includes optimizers, pipelines, agents, and debugging tools for production LLM applications.

skills.name: dspy-rag-pipeline
skills.description: Build RAG pipelines with retrieval-augmented generation using ColBERTv2 and DSPy optimization

skills.name: dspy-bootstrap-fewshot
skills.description: Auto-generate few-shot demonstrations using teacher models for quick DSPy optimization with 10-50 examples

skills.name: dspy-evaluation-suite
skills.description: Test and measure DSPy program quality with built-in and custom evaluation metrics

skills.name: dspy-finetune-bootstrap
skills.description: Distill DSPy programs into fine-tuned model weights for production deployment and cost reduction

skills.name: dspy-gepa-reflective
skills.description: Optimize complex agents and agentic systems using LLM reflection on execution trajectories

skills.name: dspy-haystack-integration
skills.description: Integrate DSPy optimization into existing Haystack pipelines for automatic prompt improvement

skills.name: dspy-miprov2-optimizer
skills.description: State-of-the-art Bayesian optimization for DSPy programs with 200+ examples using joint instruction and demo tuning

skills.name: dspy-signature-designer
skills.description: Design type-safe input/output specifications for DSPy modules with Pydantic support and advanced type hints

skills.name: dspy-react-agent-builder
skills.description: Build production ReAct agents with tool integration, GEPA optimization, and error handling for multi-step reasoning tasks

skills.name: dspy-debugging-observability
skills.description: Debug and monitor DSPy programs with MLflow tracing, custom callbacks, and production cost/latency tracking

skills.name: dspy-output-refinement-constraints
skills.description: Improve output quality with iterative refinement and constraint validation using dspy.Refine and dspy.BestofN

skills.name: dspy-simba-optimizer
skills.description: Alternative Bayesian optimizer with mini-batch statistical optimization for custom feedback scenarios and agentic tasks

skills.name: dspy-advanced-module-composition
skills.description: Compose complex pipelines with ensemble voting, multi-chain comparison, and sequential/parallel module patterns

skills.name: dspy-custom-module-design
skills.description: Design production-quality custom DSPy modules with proper architecture, state management, and serialization patterns
